message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic deal on this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $9,500 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $8,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your last offer, I would like to counter with a price of $8,750 for the product.
